headline: RTX, NOC, and LMT: 3 High Caliber Defense Stocks in a Dangerous Market
summary: While we all hope for a peaceful resolution to the escalating tensions between Israel and Iran—far more important than market movements—the conflict serves as a stark reminder of the strategic value of defense stocks. I’ve written about the defense sector previously, and these picks have performed admirably since then. Let’s take a look at three of the top aerospace and defense stocks, Lockheed Martin (LMT), RTX (RTX), and Northrop Grumman (NOC), to see where they stand today. Aerospace and defe
